summary: Fixed two nil value errors in Himalaya email commands: changed main.send_email() to main.send_current_email() at line 62, and composer.close() to main.close_without_saving() at line 96.

artifacts.summary: Fixed invalid function calls causing nil errors

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed two nil value errors in Himalaya email commands module by correcting function names: main.send_email() to main.send_current_email() and composer.close() to main.close_without_saving().

next_steps: Test changes by opening Neovim, creating an email with 'e' in himalaya sidebar, then using <leader>me to send
